title: Sudan's Bashir orders release of all political prisoners - SUNA
text:
April 10, 2018 / 2:40 PM / Updated 20 minutes ago Sudan's Bashir orders release of all political prisoners - SUNA Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
CAIRO (Reuters) - Sudan’s President Omar al-Bashir has ordered the release of all political prisoners held in the country, state news agency SUNA said on Tuesday. FILE PHOTO: Sudan's President Omar al-Bashir arrives to welcome South Sudan's President Salva Kiir Mayardit at Khartoum airport, Sudan November 1, 2017. REUTERS/Mohamed Nureldin Abdallah 
The decision came in response to the calls from political parties and groups participating in the country’s ongoing national dialogue to grant detainees the opportunity to engage in the country’s political process, SUNA reported. 
The news agency did not specify how many political prisoners the decision would affect or the names of any of those set to be released. Reporting by Omar Fahmy; Writing by Eric Knecht; Editing by Dominic Evans
